DOC.brief_summary: Fetal PATET ratio evaluation predict neonatal RDS
DOC.brief_title: Fetal Pulmonary Artery Acceleration Ejection Time Ratio ( PATET ) Prediction Subsequent Development Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS )
DOC.detailed_description: 115 patient enrolled study.Population recruit singleton pregnancy beyond 27 week gestation.All participant underwent ultrasound examination measure fetal pulmonary artery acceleration ejection time ratio ( PATET ) single experienced clinician . After delivery respiratory distress diagnosis make pediatrician blinded doppler waveform measurements.Following diagnosis , neonates divide 2 group RDS ( + ) RDS ( - ) . In addition RDS diagnosis , neonatal feature like 1st 5th minute APGAR score , neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) admission duration NICU also record . Afterwards parameter statistically analyze significant difference two group .
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman within 27 week gestation beyond patient give birth within 3 day ultrasonographic doppler examination fetuses Any congenital abnormality amniotic fluid abnormality chronic maternal disease pregnancy complication ; gestational diabetes mellitus , preeclampsia
